rules_text:
Meteor Strike deals 3 damage to target creature.
Search your hand and/or library for any number of cards named Meteor Strike and exile them. For each card exiled this way, conjure a card named Meteor Barrage. Put one into your hand for each card exiled from your hand this way, then shuffle the rest into your library. [i](It's a sorcery that costs {1}{R}{R} with “Meteor Barrage deals 3 damage to each creature.”)[/i]
